sentence.Network_en: Thorne nodded his understanding, smiling benevolently.
sentence.Network_cn: 索恩会意地点点头，慈爱地微笑着。
她亲切地站在一边看着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第五册) - 豆丁网 ... innovation n. 创新， 改革 benevolently ad. 仁慈地 reign v. 统治.

list.abs: 百度词典搜索_德 ... 德育[ moral education] 德政[ benevolent rule] virtue;moral excellence 美德.
江山一片 - 天涯问答 ... 王储[ crown prince] 王道[ kingly way;benevolent government] 王法[ the law of the land].
字典中仁字的解释 ... (8) 完美的道德[ perfect virtue] (9) 仁政[ benevolent government] (10) 恩惠[ kindness].
字典中仁字的解释 ... (14) 人[ man(pl.men)] (4) 有德者之称[ the benevolent] (8) 完美的道德[ perfect virtue].
March &laquo;... ... 不然的话不然的话/ otherwise/ 不仁不仁/ not benevolent/heartless/numb/ 不人道不人道/ inhuman/.

entry.tran: （当权者）仁慈的，慈爱的，乐善好施的
entry.def: If you describe a person in authority as benevolent, you mean that they are kind and fair.

example.ex: The company has proved to be a most benevolent employer...
example.tran: 事实证明，这家公司是非常好的雇主。

example.ex: They believe that the country needs a benevolent dictator.
example.tran: 他们认为国家需要一位仁爱的独裁者。

entry.tran: （用于慈善机构名称）慈善的，救济的
entry.def: Benevolent is used in the names of some organizations that give money and help to people who need it.

auth_sentence.content: Will factory owners benevolently feed us anyhow?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will factory owners benevolently feed us anyhow?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will factory owners benevolently feed us anyhow?
